price: My Protector is Allah Who has sent down the Book, for it is He Who protects the righteous.
arabic: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna waliyyiya al-lahu alladhī nazzala al-kitāba wahuwa yatawallā al-ṣāliḥīna
